body:
Using the Console, this crash occurs after loading a wallet (which starts rescanning), then unloading the same wallet. Using master (0f309541aa6dee91ac1cf6058c1ab5f51447b3c1).

```bash
./autogen.sh && ./configure --enable-debug && make check -j8 && make deploy
```

```bash
lldb Bitcoin-Qt.app
(lldb) target create "Bitcoin-Qt.app"
Current executable set to 'Bitcoin-Qt.app' (x86_64).
(lldb) run
Process 8595 launched: '/Users/michael/github/bitcoin/Bitcoin-Qt.app/Contents/MacOS/Bitcoin-Qt' (x86_64)
2019-06-29 12:51:35.076094+0800 Bitcoin-Qt[8595:1670460] MessageTracer: Falling back to default whitelist
Process 8595 stopped
* thread #1, name = 'bitcoin-main', queue = 'com.apple.main-thread', stop reason = EXC_BAD_ACCESS (code=EXC_I386_GPFLT)
    frame #0: 0x0000000101f1f89d QtCore`QObject::connect(QObject const*, char const*, QObject const*, char const*, Qt::ConnectionType) + 125
QtCore`QObject::connect:
->  0x101f1f89d <+125>: movq   (%r14), %rax
    0x101f1f8a0 <+128>: movq   %r14, %rdi
    0x101f1f8a3 <+131>: callq  *(%rax)
    0x101f1f8a5 <+133>: movq   %r12, -0x1a8(%rbp)
Target 0: (Bitcoin-Qt) stopped.
```

title: gui: crash in Console after loading & unloading wallet
